about.title: About
about.content: I'm Fatima Zahra, a passionate full stack development student based in Morocco. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I specialize in building responsive, user-centric digital experiences. Currently developing personal projects like Greenly and professional platforms like Diva's Bloom, while laying the foundation for my creative coding agency, Veyora.

items.position: Web Development Intern, Euroweb Digital — Tangier, Morocco
items.description: Completed a remote internship focused on developing a full e-commerce website using WordPress. Worked on custom theme development, plugin integration, and optimized user experiences—sharpening both technical skills and creative design thinking.

items.position: Technical Intern, Label Études — Tangier, Morocco
items.description: Supported civil engineering teams through web-based tools and project documentation. Contributed to data analysis and process tracking, gaining exposure to technical project workflows and collaborative teamwork in real-world environments.
Pursuing a degree in Software Development with an emphasis on full stack technologies. Learning through real-world projects and gaining strong skills in frontend, backend, and project management.

items.institution: Abdelmalek Essaadi University, Tangier — B.A. in Human Resources Management
items.description: Building expertise in organizational behavior, talent management, and leadership strategy. This program enriches my technical background with essential human-centric and collaboration skills.
Earned with honors, specializing in Life and Earth Sciences.
